content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "browse_website" command to explore the Scholastic website and found that it offers educational materials and activities for children, including literacy and math resources, book fairs and clubs, and workbooks for early literacy and numeracy. The website also features book reviews and information on new book releases, and offers resources for teachers. Contact information for Scholastic representatives and customer support is provided.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence", "question": "What is a summary of the text on the Wikipedia page for Artificial Intelligence?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : a collection of overviews, references, and sources related to artificial intelligence, covering its history, subfields, applications, tools, risks, and ethical considerations. It includes discussions on various topics such as machine learning, natural language processing, neural networks, and the potential benefits and risks of superintelligent AI systems. The text also highlights the need for regulation and ethical considerations in the development of AI.', type='action_result')]
"""
